snippet.title: Inspector Schmidt - A Bavarian Tale Trailer
snippet.description:
We are happy to announce that our highly acclaimed debut game "A Bavarian Tale - Totgeschwiegen" now has a new name that puts the spotlight on everyone's favorite unconventional detective Valentin Schmidt: Inspector Schmidt - A Bavarian Tale.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1694560/Inspector_Schmidt__A_Bavarian_Tale/

The decision to change the name was prompted by the second part of the crime series announced for this year: In Inspector Schmidt - The Ebbing, the aim is to solve a mysterious death at the North Sea that is shrouded in dark secrets. The voiceover will of course be available in the finest Plattdeutsch as well as in English.

With the overarching title Inspector Schmidt, A Bavarian Tale and The Ebbing are now under one name and pave the way for further game titles in the series.

The demo of Inspector Schmidt - The Ebbing is available on Steam:

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2492570/Inspector_Schmidt__The_Ebbing/

There, fans and interested players can test it and listen to the finest Plattdeutsch. The game is beginner-friendly - subtitles are available in German and English.

Both games in the "Inspector Schmidt series" are moving to Unreal Engine 5 for an even better gaming experience. Inspector Schmidt - A Bavarian Tale is already available on Steam in the new UE 5 version. Active Fungus Studios is also working on console ports so that Inspector Schmidt will soon be available on Xbox and PS5.
